posts.title: American Flag Liquor Flask
posts.content: Make drinking great again by patriotically pounding your liver using this American flag liquor flask. This freedom-loving two liter capacity flask is made from BPA-free food grade plastic and features a handy nozzle for easy serving.

posts.title: Doughnut Pool Float
posts.content: Indulge in a little junk food without feeling guilty by spending the day wrapped around this doughnut pool float. This delectable looking floating inflates to 4 feet wide and features an eye-catching and mouth-watering design of a bitten chocolate doughnut with sprinkles.

posts.title: Stainless Steel Drink Cooling Balls
posts.content: Real whiskey drinkers have balls of steel – and use them to cool their drinks too! The stainless steel drink cooling balls will ensure your aged whiskey remains at an ideal drinking temperature without ruining the purity of the spirit with water, like regular ice would.

posts.title: Portable Propane Grill
posts.content: Turn any beach, backyard, or park into the perfect barbecue site with this portable propane grill. This heavy duty steel grill will fit just about anywhere and comes with a grease tray and side tables in addition to a built-in igniter that lets you get right to cooking.

posts.title: Pirate Leg Pencil Sharpener
posts.content: Keep your pencil as sharp and pointy as the Captain’s unrelenting steel hook with the pirate peg leg pencil sharpener in your arsenal of school supplies. A few spins in this scallywag’s amputated leg and your pencil is as good as new, yaarrr.

posts.title: Crayola Glitter Sidewalk Chalk
posts.content: Unleash your imagination unto the street and sidewalk with the crayola glitter sidewalk chalk. These sparkly crayons come in every color of the rainbow and offer an easy and fun way for kids to create amazing works of art that can be erased with a quick hose down wash.

posts.title: Multi-Purpose Car Headrest Hooks
posts.content: Now you can neatly place everything – from groceries to purses to clothes – in your car using these multi-purpose headrest hooks. Crafted from durable metal, they’re designed to easily slide onto your headrest and can hold up to ten pounds each.

posts.title: Bacon Grilling Rack
posts.content: Avoid burning your precious bacon strips while cooking them by placing them on this bacon grilling rack. It’s coated with a smooth non-stick surface and is designed to catch the bacon grease that drips down to prevent flare-ups.

posts.title: Michael Jordan Biography
posts.content: Study the man, the myth, the legend – his Airness – like never before with the Micheal Jordan biography. Whether you’re a Bulls fan or not, this compelling read gives readers a one of a kind in-depth account to one of basketball’s greatest players ever.

posts.title: The Ice Creamery Cookbook
posts.content: Widen your repertoire of culinary talents by learning how to make masterful desserts with the “Ice Creamery Cookbook”. It comes with over 40 delicious recipes as well as helpful tips to ensure your frozen treats always come out delicious.

posts.title: Ninja Turtles 3D Nightlight
posts.content: Cowabunga dude! The Ninja Turtles 3D nightlights are dropping by to make sure your kid sleeps safe and sound. Each of the four turtles gives off a healthy radioactive like glow that creates great ambient lighting while keeping the Shredder and his goons at bay.

posts.title: LED Pen Light
posts.content: Easily write in dimly lit areas without having straining your eyes by using this LED pen light. Available in sets of three, each pen features a compact cell battery powered LED that emits a bright white light, so you can comfortably write in the dark.
